lead_paragraph: The Real Madrid teammates Cristiano Ronaldo and Gareth Bale lead national teams that will oppose each other in a European Championship semifinal, but they may not be the deciding factors in the game.

headline.print_headline: Look Away From Stars in Portugal-Wales Semifinal
headline.main: Portugal vs. Wales Represents More Than Ronaldo Against Bale

snippet: The Real Madrid teammates Cristiano Ronaldo and Gareth Bale lead national teams that will oppose each other in a European Championship semifinal, but they may not be the deciding factors in the game....
abstract: Wales is preparing to face Portugal in semifinals of UEFA European Football Championship semifinals; Portugal manager Fernando Santos says that while most eyes will be on rival star players Gareth Bale of Wales and Cristiano Ronaldo of Portugal, memorable moments are usually made by others on field.
